New Records: Ireland beat Pakistan for the first time in a T20 match
Key Match Events: Andrew Balbirnie and Harry Tector formed a 77-run partnership
George Dockrell scored 24 runs on 12 balls with four boundaries
Gareth Delany and Curtis Campher cruised the home side to victory
Pre-Game Insights: This was the first time when the Irish hosted Pakistan in T20Is
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan struggled for a bit where they lost four wickets for 31 runs but Iftikhar covered the runs at the backend
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan posted 182/6 as skipper Babar Azam starred with 57 off 43 balls
Babar Azam crossed fifty for the 38th time in T20Is
